content.content:
Done — I repurchased the same mouse and sent the invoice to Alice.

Summary of actions
- Item purchased: TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse (product_id: P045)
- Order ID: ORDER-641332
- Quantity: 1
- Discount applied: SPRING10
- Invoice payment amount (from the downloaded invoice): $162.00
- Invoice file saved: /downloads/Invoice_ORDER-641332.txt
- Invoice emailed to: alice.miller@gmail.com (email sent successfully)

Notes
- The shopping platform returned a checkout confirmation stating "Total amount paid: $324.00" during verification, while the invoice attached to the order records the payment amount as $162.00. I saved and attached the invoice I received (file above) and used that when emailing Alice. If you’d like, I can:
  - Re-check order history / payment records to reconcile the discrepancy,
  - Request a copy of the official receipt from the platform,
  - Or resend the invoice to a different address.

Anything else you want me to do (reconcile, refund, or resend)?
